name: Poly Mole
detailed_description:
Poly Mole is a puzzle game in which you have to guide your mole through a ton of different levels. Play levels from the community, create your own or test yourself in the campaign.

Campaign

Discover up to 50 levels which get harder and harder along the way. Even the smartest among you will have a hard time. There are also a lot of accessories along the way which you can collect to customize your own mole.

Community

Try the levels of the community and show them how good you are! Maybe it won't be that easy after all. The community doesn't hold back and will give you an even harder time.

Editor

Create your own levels and share them with the community. There are no limits!
